## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                        | Type     | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `messageText` | `message-text` | Optional message text to display below the loader. | `string` | `''`    |
| `size`        | `size`         | Size of the loader in pixels (width and height).   | `number` | `100`   |
